pages.text: Zeus, known to the Romans as Jupiter, is the god of the sky, thunder, and lightning.  He is the god of the gods, and the youngest son of the Titans Kronos and Rhea.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text: His children are known for their leadership and strength.$(br)$(li)Major Ability: Electrokinesis$(br)The ability to call lightning(Consumes Mana)$(br)$(li)Passive Ability: Flight$(br)The ability to fly(Consumes Mana)
